maternal obesity and thereby potentially confound the results of studies on the effects of maternal obesity or

Also, the assessment of dietary intake during pregnancy is often limited to a single survey at a single point 
in time [175,176]. Such surveys cannot assess the effects of the timing of a nutritional insult. Additional,
